title: Chemical engineer, technologist-researcher
skills: Ability of chemical, physical, physicomechanical methods of a research of properties of textile fibers and course of work on the quantitative and qualitative analysis. Skills to work with micro objects. Dye identification techniques on textile fibers and other substrates. Spectroscopy. Analytical methods for determining dye, surfactant, wastewater. There is experience of the technologist in the finishing and painting shop at the fur enterprise

primary.name: The Moscow State Textile University Alexei Kosygin
primary.organization: Faculty of Chemical Technology and Ecology

primary.name: The Moscow State Textile University Alexei Kosygin
primary.organization: Faculty of Chemical Technology and Ecology
primary.result: Chair of Chemical Technology and Finishing Equipment

experience.position: Materials Testing Process Manager; Innovation, Standardization and Testing Group

experience.company: FBU "State Regional Center of the Standardization, Metrology and Testing in Moscow"
experience.description: Development of standard test programs for technical regulations of the Russian Federation 007/2011, 017/2011, 008/2011. Сreate the models in the FGIS RusAccreditation system; Organization of conferences to textile products, subject to mandatory assessment (confirmation) of conformity under the Customs Union along with issue of unified documents. Prepare the documents in the working group of the Eurasian Economic Union. Work with Declarations of Conformity Register and Certificates of Conformity Register.

experience.company: Russian Federal Center of Forensic Science of Ministry of Justice
experience.position: Expert of the Laboratory of Forensic Examination of the Fibrous Materials
experience.description: Production of initial and repeated forensic examinations at the request of courts, procuratorial bodies and internal affairs bodies. External inspection. Establishment of fibrous structure. Withdrawal of microparticles. Microscopic research of fibers. mikrospektrofotometrichesky researches. Microchemical analysis. Cooperation with the European Network of Forensic Science Institutes (ENFSI) in the European Textile and Hair Group (ETHG). Science work, including quality standards with the aim to continually improve and develop methods, techniques and procedures. Case presentations, outlining lessons learnt from casework. Workshops and/or interactive demonstrations on training and collaborative exercises.

experience.company: The Moscow State Textile University Alexei Kosygin
experience.position: Assistant Chair of Chemical Technology and Finishing Equipment of Chemical Technology and Finishing Equipment, Deputy Dean of the Scientific Work
experience.description:
Giving lectures, algorithmization in teaching students skills and abilities to work in a chemical laboratory. Giving advise students of the chair about diploma qualification works. 
Research work on chair was held within the related preparation and study fibrous materials.
Author of the invention № 2011113492 dated 08.04.2011 "Method of cold dyeing with insoluble azo colourants of fibrous materials" in the Federal Service for Intellectual Property. It published more than 25 scientific works (including 3 articles in journals recommended by VAK) and a report on the Ninth All-Russian Scientific Conference "Textiles of the XXI Century."
